title: Die Stadtklinik
overview: In a big city hospital in Cologne, also known as the Stadtklinik, doctors and nursing staff battle against medical and human problems on a daily basis. In addition, competition, love affairs and intrigues arise among colleagues. Medical disputes are the order of the day for the doctors at the Stadtklinik, and social controversies are also reflected here, for example in questions of euthanasia.
